name: Space Moonshiner
description:
You'll Start On One Of Several Planets.

Build some basic buildings and fly your ship over the surface of the planet in search of plants. Their fruits can be turned into moonshine.
Equip the ship with scanners to find underground gas and mineral deposits. Then use the drill rigs to mine them.
Expand your base. Build tanks, batteries, generators... Get energy from gas, wind or sun. Build a refinery and produce fuel for ships.
Build distillers and produce the best moonshine! Trade with space guilds... You can sell and buy anything: Moonshine, raw materials, machinery, weapons... everything you need. Find villages where the local inhabitants of the planets live and trade goods with them.
You can wage war with them if you want. Or destroy them completely and rob their villages.
Build a space port! You will be able to produce probes that you send into space to explore other planets and moons.
Build ships to fly to other worlds! Every planet is different... landscape, gravity, vegetation, animals, inhabitants... Explore Your planetary system!
Fight or hunt dangerous creatures (you can sell or exchange their skins).
Find ancient broken machines and repair them! Some of them will give you energy ... others will protect you.
Fight with hostile aliens. Bomb their bases ... use your rich arsenal of weapons!
Fly ships over the surface of planets and moons, or get off and run on foot! Explore the caves. in some you will find interesting things...
On each of the planets you can build several bases in different locations.
Search for hidden ancient alien artifacts. When you find them - examine them! This will allow you to build a ship to fly to other stars!
This is the main goal of the game.
SEE A HUGE WEALTH OF POSSIBILITIES!
